Articles.Content:
In IVA every screen is grey:

[http://postimg.org/image/wdhbnbzpj/](http://postimg.org/image/wdhbnbzpj/)

electric charge is full. any ideas?

> 
> In IVA every screen is grey:

> 
> electric charge is full. any ideas?

You using ATM ?
This happens to me whenever I enter or leave fullscreen mode, but it's fixed by going on EVA and boarding again. Try doing that.
